page.title: 07HARLOW SCHOOL RENOVATIONS .
page.content: Our primary school was founded by{Mr. {Barnard and Mr.Fawbert}in 1836.He left Mr.Barnard Â£8,000 in his will to do what he thought was best. He decided to build a school for{Old Harlow.}This is now being redesigned because after the war with the rise in birth-rate temporary "Horsa" huts had to be erected.These will now be demolished along with the outside toilets and the original building is being stripped , rebuilt and extended .A new hall has so far taken a year to build. During this time, for the pupils, it has been noisy, dirty, inconvenient, and time wasting. Numbers on roll are now 158 due to falling birth-rate.There are now five classes, one for infants and four juniors.They are all looking forward to the New Look for our school .
